column1: This week I visited the Humboldt County Emergency Operations Center and met with Director Ryan Derby and other personnel involved in handling the coronavirus pandemic. Cases across our district are surging and I am grateful to these professionals for their tireless work. https://t.co/yObayI1w7H

As we prepare for the upcoming holiday season we can't forget that we are still in a pandemic. The best way to keep our friends and family healthy is to minimize travel limit gatherings and follow coronavirus travel advisories and guidelines. https://t.co/wY8CiGoz10

The Trump administration needs to stop delaying and disrupting @Transition46. All Americans expect a peaceful transition of power to ensure economic recovery national security and a successful coronavirus response. https://t.co/hO8sKPnvZM

❌7.3 million workers will lose Pandemic Unemployment Assistance ❌4.6 million workers will be cut off from Pandemic Emergency Unemployment Compensation   That’s just part of what’s at risk if @senatemajldr doesn’t come to the table and negotiate more #COVID relief.

As we enter flu season coronavirus cases are rising. To keep everyone safe we need to continue social distancing mask wearing and hand washing.   It's also important that everyone gets their flu shot to avoid straining hospitals. Get yours today ➡️ https://t.co/GXdGXeclwt https://t.co/MlQK1qS5ya

I spoke with @KSRO about the election turnout and the work left to do in congress including passing a new covid response bill.   While our country may feel more divided than ever we must come together and do our job #ForThePeople. Listen here ⬇️ https://t.co/g8hlUDY3rb

The country is still battling #COVID19 and we all need to be covered--with both a mask and health coverage. California health insurance enrollment is open now! Visit https://t.co/GK5XF2YKfE to choose a health plan that works for you today. #GetCovered #OpenEnrollment https://t.co/wO5IwSR3BG

I’m excited and proud to share that one of my constituents Dr. Robert Rodriguez has been selected to serve on the new Biden/Harris COVID-19 Advisory Board. This science-driven action is exactly the leadership this country needs.  https://t.co/fJcvsTLtpL

The US is setting new dangerous records every day now hitting 10 million #COVID19 cases. It’s never been more important to have strong national leadership—and Pres-elect Biden and VP-elect Harris aren’t wasting any time. https://t.co/vqDXWRMdtx

I was grateful to join volunteers this weekend at @SFMFoodBank distributing food for struggling families. COVID has caused a food crisis -- the need for assistance is rapidly growing but federal subsidies are running out. Congress must pass additional relief #ForThePeople. https://t.co/kYCV4qZzLZ

Now that the election's over there are no excuses to delay passing a comprehensive #COVID relief package. Americans have been waiting far too long for the support they need. It's time for @SenateGOP to step up & agree to a package #ForThePeople.  https://t.co/jIPFKsW0Go

We are all still waiting for the Trump admin to work w/ us on urgently needed COVID relief for Americans. Instead of responding to @HouseDemocrats relief proposal Trump is spending taxpayer $$ on insane PR stunts before the election.  https://t.co/R7rQq0NGqZ

Looks like Trump knows the truth about climate he just ignores it. Just like he downplayed the coronavirus that has now cost hundreds of thousands of lives. In both cases the costs of his inaction will be incalculable.   https://t.co/SBRdC81FuJ

Just a quick reminder that while @HouseDemocrats have passed several bills to provide #COVID relief Trump erratically canceled negotiations—refusing to support our families frontline heroes workers teachers & children.   This negotiation-whiplash is hurting Americans.

More funding is needed so that every student can receive a proper education especially during this pandemic. That’s why I'm pushing for #IDEA funding in future COVID relief with @RepNeguse @RepMcKinley @RepHaleyStevens & @RepAngieCraig. https://t.co/ZtK8fCYxRD

This message is wildly dangerous and a slap in the face to the thousands who have lost loved ones because of Trump’s failure to lead. We are 8 months into this & +210000 dead. We can save lives if we learn from the mistakes made and take COVID seriously. https://t.co/3rsMw2iO5w

The President needs to be honest with White House staff officials and the public about their COVID exposure due to his reckless behavior. We can’t keep people safe if Trump and his team are covering up and withholding info from public health officials. https://t.co/6QnBwdpx3i

We are of course all sending our thoughts to the Trump family and the White House staff who have tested positive for COVID-19. I can only hope that once he recovers President Trump learns from this experience and changes some of his actions that have made us all less safe:

Trump and @SenateGOP have failed to take #COVID seriously—and America has paid the terrible price.   Today @HouseDemocrats honored our commitment to the American people to rebuild the economy & save lives by passing the updated #HeroesAct. https://t.co/pf4cJWsELj

CA is reeling from climate-driven wildfires & the abject failures of the White House. I have no patience for climate deniers who don't believe our communities deserve federal support & I won’t back down from trying to get FEMA to assist communities hit hard by wildfires & COVID. https://t.co/j2dcnoelPf

We need greater transparency & disclosure on how #COVID aid is being spent. The #CongressionalFreethoughtCaucus strongly endorses @RepJayapal & @SenWarren’s #COREAct which will provide much needed oversight of federal COVID-19 relief funding.

The Trump admin’s political interference in @CDCgov's reports on #Coronavirus is unacceptable. The American people deserve reliable information from public health agencies and we need to be able to trust expert agencies to put public health first.  https://t.co/dS3QTU9MyH

Half measures are not acceptable for the next round of #covid stimulus. Thanks @KSRO for having me on to talk about the relief we need and the urgency for @senatemajldr to take meaningful action. Listen here ⬇️ https://t.co/YIanAoD6pF

Our nation is experiencing a significant shortage of poll workers due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Help everyone’s voice be heard by signing up to be a poll worker on November 3 here: https://t.co/OqjBfTAG1w #PollWorkerRecruitmentDay

Congress passed the #CARES Act to save lives and help families and #smallbiz make ends meet during the coronavirus pandemic. But working through @IPAAaccess Big Oil was able to stealthily win bailouts for their already failing industry. #TradeUp   https://t.co/DjuOIQFeFa
Small businesses private non-profits and agricultural businesses impacted by the #COVID19 pandemic can still apply for an Economic Injury Disaster Loan. Learn more here ⬇️ https://t.co/WYky4ZkRmb
#COVID19 doesn’t stop for other emergencies. If you need to stay in a shelter due to the #CAwildfires please follow these guidelines to keep yourself and others safe. https://t.co/HsoXJXULQw

The unwarranted interest from this bungled loan coupled with the damage from the coronavirus pandemic has left the fishery struggling to make ends meet. This is great news long overdue and will go a long way toward helping these fishermen stay afloat. https://t.co/PiR20IcqsO

I’m co-hosting a blood drive with the Northern CA Community Blood Bank TOMORROW August 12.   Critical blood supplies in the US have taken a hit during the coronavirus pandemic and we could use your help. Sign up for a time slot here: https://t.co/DltWV572oL https://t.co/aaHDsSkOd5

|While the Senate failed to pass our #HeroesAct:  🏠 32% of Americans were unable to fully make their July housing payment on the 1st of the month. 📉 Tens of millions unemployed 🦠 Over 53000 new COVID-19 cases a day.  Senate Republicans are doing nothing || #FailureToLead|

Critical blood supplies in the US have taken a hit during the coronavirus pandemic. I’m co-hosting a blood drive with the Northern CA Community Blood Bank on August 12. Sign up for a time slot here: https://t.co/DltWV572oL https://t.co/fFgfX6c0Xd

The decision by @uscensusbureau undercuts every effort that communities across the US have made to ensure everyone is counted.   Field operations have already been hindered by #COVID and we cannot afford to further disrupt these efforts. #WeAllCount https://t.co/0fjeCgHeXb

#COVID19 has devastated the child care sector & it’s time we stop undervaluing this essential service. W/ the Child Care for Economic Recovery Act we can: 👪 Help more low/middle-income families afford care 🏫 Support providers struggling from COVID10 💵 Strengthen the economy

#COVID19 has highlighted America’s #digitaldivide. The need for tele-health work and education boomed overnight but rural areas like many in my district still lack sufficient broadband access. Building out broadband infrastructure must be a priority. #RuralBroadbandDay

Equal access to an appropriate education for all students is the law even during the pandemic. I led a letter to House leadership to include strong IDEA funding in the next COVID bill so schools have the resources to  support all students. https://t.co/W5hM0BgKoJ

Today’s funding bill includes many of our hard-fought priorities like remediating trespass marijuana grows protecting treasured lands from oil exploration and establishing the U.S. as a leader in the fight against #COVID19. More to come next week! https://t.co/K1Rca82m3J

#COVID19 has prevented Tribes from applying for the @FCC's 2.5GHz Rural Tribal Priority Window an initiative for Tribes to claim unused spectrum over their lands. For improved availability & adoption the window's deadline must be extended. #ConnectTribes https://t.co/5oU9Qj6ze1

Thousands of out of work gig workers & freelancers got little to no financial relief from #COVID. I’m working to support these workers as an original cosponsor of @RepJudyChu & @RepAdamSchiff’s bill so they can receive #PUA under the #CARESAct. https://t.co/HWEVO6cAYz

With millions of #COVID19 cases nationwide we have ALL been personally victimized by those who refuse to wear a mask. Mask up & stop the spread of this pandemic. #OnWednesdaysWeWearPink #WearAMask https://t.co/v6FVQ6KhHk

Since the beginning of the COVID-19 crisis the U.S. has faced shortages of medical supplies that are critical to saving lives and slowing the spread of the virus. Trump needs to fully employ the #DefenseProductionAct immediately. https://t.co/67f9sXjuMz

We had some great virtual events to end the week—thanks to all who tuned in and participated! If you missed them you can watch the #ClimateAction Town Hall and #Mendocino Town Hall on #Coronavirus at my youtube page here: https://t.co/9q6jAkD3nw

This evening I’m hosting a virtual #Mendocino community town hall. Join me and special guests for a conversation on the #coronavirus pandemic and how our community and the federal government are responding. Tune in at https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk at 5pm PT. https://t.co/0QEG6TE0Ny

Today I asked @NOAA for answers on their response to the #coronaviruspandemic. Now more than ever it is critical that federal agencies are adaptive transparent & focused on keeping their workforce safe and addressing the real needs of those they serve. https://t.co/NG2rCXoaHV

This Friday I’m hosting a virtual #Mendocino community town hall. Join me and special guests for a conversation on the #coronavirus pandemic and how our community and the federal govt are responding. Tune in at https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk at 5pm PT on 7/17. https://t.co/KLL2MmYCwG

There is no question that NOAA has felt the impacts of #COVID19: they’ve stopped important surveys and we’ve seen serious outbreaks at fish processing facilities. Refusing to say the word ‘coronavirus’ won’t make the pandemic go away. Ridiculous. https://t.co/wwWUYjRfcZ

What it comes down to is this: the success of reopening is going to depend on the behaviors of every community member. Now is the time to remain vigilant stay smart wear masks and use social distancing to protect each other and save lives.   #COVID19 #CoronavirusCrisis

Despite Trump’s cronies trying to cover up his repeated confessions the truth is clear: Trump slowed down #COVID19 testing -- putting American lives at risk for his own political gain. Unforgivable. https://t.co/GM37Lf6EyH

#COVID19 has highlighted the failure of the federal govt to live up to its trust responsibility to tribes. #2020Census data will help distribute federal funding to Indigenous communities for the next decade. Fill out your census at https://t.co/JXC8tXFzP5 #NativeAmericanActionDay

ICYMI: I closed out #OlderAmericansMonth by joining @AARP’s telephone town hall. Listen here for our discussion on the govt’s response to the enormous challenges that the coronavirus crisis poses for the nation’s aging population. https://t.co/Npu1Rnvx8P

Rebuilding our economy after #Coronavirus will mean investing in work that makes our environment clean and livable. During our @NRDems virtual forum we discussed how we can lay the groundwork for an economy that’s pro-jobs and pro-environment. https://t.co/RxwqaTcaMT

42.6 million people without work because of #COVID19. The clock is ticking on extending federal benefits -- the Senate must take action on the #HeroesAct to protect the lives and livelihoods of Americans. https://t.co/mE8MN6TeFh

Interested in becoming a contact tracer to help contain #COVID19? Many county and city public health offices are seeking qualified candidates now. Check with your local public health office for job opportunities and #SlowTheSpread. https://t.co/7te3KjR8cI

This week we marked a somber milestone: more than 100000 Americans lost to COVID19. This level of human loss is difficult to comprehend & accept. I will continue to do everything in my power to help our country through this tragedy & honor the lives lost. https://t.co/aAKgAPhiEy

America needs broader more aggressive relief measures to get us through the #COVID19 fallout. The bills proposed by @RepJayapal and @RepDonBeyer make the smart investments the country needs to weather this pandemic.  https://t.co/41a8CQlXn2

Testing tracing containing. We’ve been beating this drum for months and it’s great news to see Sonoma County taking the steps necessary to control #COVID19 and get the economy up and running. Now if only Trump would put a solid plan in place. https://t.co/VeUswKqPVL

Deaths are soaring among people experiencing homelessness. My #COVID19SHELTER Act would put measures in place to creatively house individuals & support them throughout this crisis & its aftermath preventing senseless deaths.  https://t.co/wIVuRk5BmA

The @alzassociation has been doing amazing work on the ground to fight for some of the most vulnerable members of society. I had the pleasure of joining them for a virtual town hall today to discuss the federal response to #COVID19 and how Congress can support their crucial work. https://t.co/LatRM3VxvF

Thanks @PetalumaArgus for this piece on my work during the #COVIDcrisis. This pandemic demands immediate action—and @housedemocrats are pushing forward a coherent unified strategy that the President has failed to provide so we can save jobs & lives. https://t.co/8NU6Qypspt

Every part of the seafood industry has been hit by #COVID19 upending the coastal economy that thousands of people depend on. I led an unofficial @NRDems ‘virtual hearing’ to hear directly from folks in the fishing world & discuss how the federal govt can provide crucial relief. https://t.co/2QmXt40jcE

Great comparison piece in @Washingtonpost. #ClimateChange and #COVID19 are global crises each with devastating impacts that get worse with delay. If we take the steps needed to mitigate & adapt we can #FlattenTheCurve on both—saving the planet and lives. https://t.co/V9iIRepVou
Don’t forget to join me at 2pm PDT today! I’m going live on Facebook to answer questions and give an update on Congress’ work to combat #COVID19. Tune in here https://t.co/Rmf2yuZUkD

U.S. elections are under threat. The #HeroesAct ensures voters can safely participate in this year’s election. Even amid the #coronavirus pandemic we must uphold the Constitution and #DefendOurDemocracy. https://t.co/3yVVRzIET6

Another Trump official abusing relief from Congress. Betsy DeVos is exploiting the #COVID19 pandemic to funnel millions of taxpayer dollars to private schools and religious institutions taking $$ away from the kids and teachers who need the most help. https://t.co/TwruhG5QaW

Congress’ oversight work is more needed than ever which is why today I’m leading @NRDems unofficial "virtual hearing" to look at devastating #COVID19 impacts to US fisheries and the seafood supply chain. Watch here  ➡️ https://t.co/o4MtGvgUfk

PSA for #CA02 fire officers: FEMA has extended the SAFER Grant application window to May 27. It’s difficult to imagine another crisis on top of #coronavirus but wildfire season is around the corner and we need to prepare. https://t.co/5DBc8T5e8L

Adequate testing is the #1 tool we need to combat the #coronavirus and get the US up and running. Trump says more testing “makes us look bad.” His ‘strategy’ and false claims clearly aren’t enough. He needs to work with us to drastically increase testing. https://t.co/xyHPcauTQs

Dr. Bright’s brave testimony shows what it means to be a public servant. The Trump administration ignored warnings and science worsening the #coronaviruscrisis and costing lives.   We MUST listen to the experts. Lives depend on it.  https://t.co/9M18BH1ECw

The #coronaviruscrisis requires an unprecedented federal response and Congress has a responsibility to ensure families and states can weather the long road ahead. The #HeroesAct provides CA $93.2 bn in direct relief—Republicans shouldn’t deny Americans this lifeline. https://t.co/uV8rfAK4aO

My weeks have been filled with virtual meetings with local officials health care workers and committee roundtables as we work together to respond to the evolving challenges of #COVID19. Take a look at my weekly recap: https://t.co/5IaWs5kXGZ

This latest scam is sickening. Your children will NOT be taken away if you test positive for #COVID19 and have applied for benefits. Please do not be afraid to seek help from CA’s many public services like CalFresh or Medi-Cal.  https://t.co/dNE450HZ9B

Administration oversight changes to how Congress operates and an upcoming vote on the latest #COVID19 stimulus package—the #HeroesAct; we’ve got a lot to discuss at today’s virtual check-in.   Tune in at 2pm PST at https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk. See you then!

Testing tracing & containing are the key to safely reopening the US. @HouseDemocrats & @COVIDOversight are doing the work that the Executive Branch has refused to do: listening to the experts and making sure we have plans in place to keep people healthy. https://t.co/aMpA4sN4sq

Just over half of us in #CA02 have completed the census—that’s less than the national rate. #COVID19 has shown us the importance of having enough resources through an accurate count of each community. Visit https://t.co/JXC8tXFzP5 & get counted today.  https://t.co/k8RsFyvLI3

CA & the US already had a serious lack of affordable housing. Now thousands of ppl are losing their jobs every day w/ no place to go. With the #COVID19SHELTER Act we can creatively house individuals & support them throughout this crisis & its aftermath. https://t.co/KiA9mm42SX

#COVID19 is creating an unprecedented strain on the food supply chain including the seafood industry. My bipartisan request would get direct relief to folks & stimulate seafood purchasing—providing healthy domestically produced food for Americans. https://t.co/QuUYIUM9uH
We’ve been saying this from jump. Testing testing testing. The experts agree—if we want to safely reopen the country we MUST increase our testing capacity for #COVID19. https://t.co/kGZLbDbybo

Great news: our efforts to get congressionally directed relief funding to fishery participants has paid off. Fishing tribes and businesses have been hit hard by #coronavirus and they need this support asap.  https://t.co/wFYxbaUNo3

Native Americans have been left behind in the #coronavirus pandemic & I’m glad to see this long overdue decision to distribute some of the relief that Congress provided.   The admin needs to drop plans to divert $$ away from tribes. https://t.co/M9HYZxqsGJ

Instead of focusing on the #COVID19 crisis impacts on schools and students @BetsyDeVosED is using her time to undermine students’ safety. The new #TitleIX rule makes it harder for sexual misconduct survivors to seek justice weakens accountability and makes students less safe. https://t.co/0mU3dwiqDq
Starting soon: I’m going live on Facebook at 2pm PST to answer questions and give an update on Congress’ work to combat #COVID19. Tune in here ➡️ https://t.co/Rmf2yuZUkD

Journalists are providing access to vital information on the #coronaviruscrisis. But many local news outlets including public media stations are struggling to make ends meet. Glad to see #CA02’s valued local @KMUDNews get relief from the #CARESAct. https://t.co/YSXzd1GNRi

Good news to end the week: Following my letter to @CMSGov rural health centers can now get reimbursed for phone-only telehealth services! This is such a vital part of fighting #COVID19 especially in rural areas like we have in #CA02.   https://t.co/TgeqjasGbv

By not allowing legal marijuana businesses to access the same #COVID19 relief as other #smallbiz we are putting hardworking people at risk. The cannabis industry is a part of the North Coast economy and I’ll keep working to ensure they get equal relief. https://t.co/LyDZ7qOfQw

Don’t forget to join me tomorrow for virtual office hours. I’m going live on Facebook at 2pm PST to answer questions and give an update on Congress’ work to combat #COVID19. Tune in here ➡️ https://t.co/jQZmSIb6g5

.@OSHA_DOL is charged with protecting US workers & ensuring safe workplaces. But in the middle of the worst safety crisis in recent history the Trump admin is refusing to take action. We must protect workers on the frontlines of the fight against #COVID19. #WorkersMemorialDay https://t.co/uxEvDfGIhc

We need to get testing right before reopening the country. Trump’s still doing far too little far too late to get enough tests. Adequate testing is critical if we want to slow the spread of the #coronavirus and save lives.  https://t.co/SyBjYOehIM

Remember to continue checking my site for regularly updated #COVID19 info news on govt services and programs & useful links and resources. And you can always reach out to my office for direct assistance. Stay safe - we will get through this together. https://t.co/60P6Pr5PYb

From the start the Trump admin has abandoned Tribes in the fight against the #COVID19 pandemic. @NRDems will keep working to support tribal communities dealing with #coronavirus outbreaks.  Keep up with the latest #CoronavirusIndianCountry updates here ➡️ https://t.co/sXHArdBxck

Please please PLEASE listen to medical experts not the President or his sycophants. Under no circumstances should you inject yourself with disinfectants. This will not protect you from #COVID19. https://t.co/j5SGjWyElk

It’s not a novel concept. Any large allocation of $ invites misuse. Yesterday’s vote to create an oversight subcommittee for #COVID19 spending follows the lessons from Truman’s WWII spending oversight committee & will ensure taxpayer funds are used appropriately #ForThePeople.

The #COVID19 outbreak has left many California #smallbiz owners uncertain about the future. 92% of owners have already been negatively impacted. @smlbizmajority’s report illustrates the urgent need for the president to finally prioritize #smallbiz relief. https://t.co/E2COujOmju

The #coronavirus crisis highlights how important it is that communities get all the resources they need. Making sure we have an accurate #2020Census count is one way to do that. Make sure you’re counted today. #WeAllCount https://t.co/7s2fowKiKg
Starting soon: join me @ 2pm for my weekly Facebook Live check-in to answer questions about #COVID19. Watch here ➡️ https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk

All across the US essential employees including transportation & emergency workers are stepping up & doing their part to help stop the spread of #COVID19.  The essential job you do keeps our country moving and brings us closer to overcoming this crisis. #ToThoseWhoKeepUsMoving https://t.co/JZW2ZHdPPI

If you’re an SSA retirement survivor or disability recipient with dependents <17 and didn’t file your 2018/2019 taxes #TakeActionNow and visit https://t.co/Oxxuy5WmSh and enter your payment information by WEDNESDAY 4/22 to receive additional #COVID19 relief payments.

Millions of immigrants in the US are essential workers risking their lives every day to save others.  We must ensure that they can access critical coronavirus relief benefits by passing the #Coronavirus Immigrant Protection Act. #DiversityIsOurStrength #NationOfImmigrants

Humboldt County is submitting a disaster claim and needs your help. Please consider completing this survey of #coronavirus related loss and help get an accurate picture of the relief our community needs. https://t.co/Rs2jlYLZdp
🚨Today @ noon PST🚨 Join me for my weekly Facebook Live check-in to answer your questions about #COVID19. Watch here ➡️ https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk

Broadband access is a necessity not a luxury. We already knew this on the north coast & I’ve been working on closing the #DigitalDivide since I was first elected. The #COVID19 crisis has made it clear that it must quickly be made a national priority. https://t.co/LBoTOuhUvR

Join me for my next #ShelterInPlace Virtual Town Hall TODAY at 5pm PST. I’ll be joined by local experts to discuss the ongoing #coronavirus crisis and answer live questions. Watch live at https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk. https://t.co/ToeQW6nsRD

As some of you know this is a deeply personal issue for me—my mother-in-law recently contracted COVID19 in a nursing home. More testing MUST be a priority. Congress appropriated the funding now we need the administration to follow through. https://t.co/8RZbZCGWAB

Many Americans need immediate and recurring help to weather the #COVID19 pandemic which is why @HouseDems negotiated for Economic Impact Payments. Follow the link below to see the most recent FAQ from @IRSnews on this vital program. https://t.co/84FgTiazva

Join me for my next #ShelterInPlace Virtual Town Hall this Monday at 5pm PST. I’ll be joined by local experts to discuss the ongoing #coronavirus crisis and answer live questions. Watch live at https://t.co/5r2hPUw3Tk. https://t.co/3jwOQzwv2T

The #COVID19 pandemic is putting significant strain on students. Kudos to Mendocino College Foundation for putting together this donation program AND committing to matching funds. See more here ➡️ https://t.co/bYBIqiHExY https://t.co/e7fuQIbCeh

Scientists across the country are prevented from pursuing promising COVID-19 research using fetal tissue because of federal restrictions. We need to put science and public health first and immediately remove these unnecessary barriers. https://t.co/YkhwhXjKyf

Today's Humboldt Board of Supervisors meeting is streaming live! Tune in here as I present to the board on the recently passed CARES Act and Congress' ongoing plans to provide relief during and after the #coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/yiWqBvYFcG
Threats from #COVID19 come in all forms - including robocall scams. We’re calling on the   @FCC and @TheJusticeDept to use every tool available to protect Americans. https://t.co/ECSBwgril7

People experiencing homelessness are being left behind even as individual cases of coronavirus among the population rise. All levels of government have a responsibility to ensure our most vulnerable Americans are not forgotten and can receive the support they need. https://t.co/atBFBQaJHI

Everyone is feeling the impacts of #COVID19 especially small businesses. The recently passed #CARES Act includes an array of initiatives to assist business owners nonprofits & other employers. My staff is always here to help contact us & learn more → https://t.co/YPMswTGoV4 https://t.co/eaVBTIteLo

The #COVID19 pandemic reinforces the challenges that underfunding of special education creates especially as we move to remote learning. I led over 50 of my colleagues in a bipartisan letter asking leadership to prioritize full funding for #IDEA. https://t.co/n03R6EYaka

Agricultural businesses are essential and shouldn’t be left out of CARES Act benefits designed to help workers weather the impacts of #COVID19.   We called on @SBA to fix this: farmers and ag businesses need to be included in vital relief programs. https://t.co/sigJAo8UP4 https://t.co/treeLEpGpK

The health safety and economic security of older Americans is at a heightened risk right now. AARP put together an array of free information tools and resources to help seniors during the #coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/KYrHSstjEn

Trump's failure to act on #Coronavirus has put Native communities at risk. Lives will be lost that should have been saved. @HouseDemocrats passed 3 relief packages w/ major aid for Indian Country. Fed agencies must work w/ Tribes NOW to stop the #CoronavirusIndianCountry outbreak https://t.co/O94hfbQ8Gw

We should not let our very real disputes w. the Iranian govt prevent us from treating the people of Iran with compassion. @realdonaldtrump needs to ease sanctions that will damage the Iranian health care system & could contribute to the spread of #COVID19. https://t.co/4NGd0Mf3b4

For everyone’s safety we need to help each other #FlattenTheCurve of #COVID19 by staying at home. I know that we can get through this together if we all do our part to make safe responsible decisions and take steps to help each other out. https://t.co/dYnMne0cZb

The Trump admin should be 100% focused on fixing their inadequate response to #COVID19. Instead they're gutting environmental policies. I’m joining @DorisMatsui to move legislation that protects people & the planet by reversing this awful decision. https://t.co/6ArrvhUmGB

Ahora que estás en casa practicando el distanciamiento social ¿por qué no llenar el censo? ✅ Puede completar el censo desde casa Por internet 💻 https://t.co/XGCNZJwrmo Por teléfono 📲 1-844-468-2020 O por correo si recibió el formulario. 📩 #HagaseContar #COVID19 https://t.co/72ExQAiyoe

Another great way folks are working to help others suffering from the #COVID19 crisis. If you run a small business and need help navigating federal relief SCORE is offering free mentoring on how to get SBA loans. https://t.co/PuUsGRxpaq

🚨There are now two new refundable payroll tax credits for small and midsize businesses. These are designed to promptly and fully reimburse employers dollar-for-dollar for the cost of providing #Coronavirus-related leave to their employees. https://t.co/ey1acJds2N
